title: Pixel 2 XL won't charge with original charger or replacement genuine charger.
content:
Phone all of a sudden doesn't charge with original factory charger. Conveniently it's just out of warranty period.

This is a problem a large number of people are having. Threads have been locked. Google need to acknowledge and fix this problem.

-Original charger works on other phones
-replaced charger and cable with new genuine type. Didn't work.
- updated phone didn't work
-Factory reset didn't work
-Cleaned port with compressed air and pikster didn't work.
- tried a USB-A to USB-C cable out of computer,  works but slowly. And plugging it in causes the phone to instantly turn off.

I want to buy the pixel xl 4 but if this isn't acknowledged and fixed I will not be buying another Google phone.
